name: bridge
description: MCP server for capturing and analyzing experiential data

scripts.build:all: npm run build && npm run bundle
scripts.test:bridge: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts
scripts.test:bridge:experience: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts experience-capture
scripts.test:bridge:recall: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts recall-queries
scripts.test:bridge:reconsider: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts reconsider-evolution
scripts.test:bridge:release: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts release-cleanup
scripts.test:bridge:dimensional: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts dimensional-focus
scripts.test:bridge:pattern-realizations: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts pattern-realizations
scripts.test:bridge:quick: npm run build && npx tsx src/scripts/test-runner.ts experience-capture
scripts.test:all: npm test && npm run test:bridge && npm run loop
scripts.quality-check: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run lint:md && npm run build && npm test && npm run test:bridge:quick
scripts.quality-check:full: npm run type-check && npm run lint && npm run lint:md && npm run build && npm run test:coverage && npm run test:bridge && npm run loop
